abilities.description: (PASSIVE)SHURIMA'S LEGACYAzir can summon the Disc of the Sun from the ruins of allied or enemy turrets.
abilities.name: SHURIMA

abilities.description: (Q)CONQUERING SANDSAzir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a slow for 1 second.
abilities.name: CONQUERING SANDSA

abilities.description: (W)ARISE!Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line. Arise! also passively grants attack speed to Azir and his Sand Soldiers.
abilities.name: ARISE

abilities.description: (E)SHIFTING SANDSAzir shields himself briefly and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he instantly readies a new Sand Soldier for deployment and halts his dash.
abilities.name: SHIFTING SANDSA

abilities.description: (R)EMPEROR'S DIVIDEAzir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.
abilities.name: EMPEROR
